result.execSummary:
The defendant Raymond E Crowe was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: Penalty - Sexual Exploitation of a Child

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Defendant Raymond E Crowe in court, in custody with attorney Peter Michael Masana.  Brenda L. Yaskal appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Counsel makes argument, Atty Masana reads statement for defendant, Court sentences defendant to: Ct. 4, 23 years prison, 8 years initial confinement, consecutive, 15 years extended supervision, consecutive, no contact w/victim or victim's family, no contact w/minor females unless approved by agent and treatment provider, mandatory compliance w/sex offender registry, DNA Sample, sex offender treatment and comply, mandatory face to face contact with law enforcement as directed, treatment to be continued while defendant is on extended supervision, absolute sobriety, AODA and comply, absolute sobriety, defendant is not eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program or Substances Abuse Program
with Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus for Kettle Moraine Correctional Institution on 5/3/16 at 11:00 A.M.
Sentencing hearing at 05-03-2016 11:00 am

Cases called: 14CF101 & 14CF140, Defendant Raymond E Crowe in court, in custody with attorney Peter Michael Masana.  Brenda L. Yaskal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court went over the rights & elements. Defendant pled no contest to count 4. Persistent repeater dismissed. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment. PSI ordered, to be completed within 60 days. All other counts and 14CF140 read in and dismissed.

Cases heard: 14CF101 & 14CF140, Defendant Raymond E Crowe in court, in custody with attorney Peter Michael Masana.  ADA Yaskal appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense stands mute on the competency to stand trial. Court found defendant able to assist in his own defense. Atty. Masana entered not guilty by mental disease/defect in 14CF101 case. Order to be prepared. Other case to be set for preliminary hearing.
